org.jetel.graph.distribution

Class EngineComponentAllocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.distribution.EngineComponentAllocation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EngineComponentAllocation.AllClusterNodesEngineComponentAllocation, EngineComponentAllocation.ClusterNodesEngineComponentAllocation, EngineComponentAllocation.ComponentEngineComponentAllocation, EngineComponentAllocation.NeighboursEngineComponentAllocation, EngineComponentAllocation.NumberEngineComponentAllocation, EngineComponentAllocation.SandboxEngineComponentAllocation

    public abstract class EngineComponentAllocation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents type of allocation of a single component. Currently supported allocations: - derived from neigbours - derived from a component - derived from a partitioned sandbox - derived from a number requested partitions - allocation on all available cluster nodes - allocation on list of specified cluster nodes
